case.name: Logic Group Tyres Pty Limited v Tokio Marine & Nichido Fire Insurance Co Limited [2008] FCA 1297 (21 August 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: indemnity costs sought by first respondent
whether offer reasonable and more favourable than final orders. held : it was

citances.sentence: 1 This is an application for costs in relation to a proceeding in which I have already given a judgment on 21 August 2008: Logic Group Tyres Pty Limited v Tokio Marine & Nichido Fire Insurance Co Limited [2008] FCA 1297.
